verbs.description: On MSNBC on Thursday , the hosts [V: were] competing to see which one could be more upset that President Trump welcomed three Americans home from being imprisoned in North Korea . Ari Melber put in a strong bid on his show The Beat , inviting on a reality - TV show producer to call the president .... a “ thirsty bitch . ”
